document_data.name: Lutwill
document_data.Description:
Lutwill was a very large man, standing taller than an [[orog]] with a large stomach. He had a squat nose and dark-colored eyes. He had dark hair, with bushy eyebrows and a thick mustache that grew back to his sideburns. He had a friendly sounding baritone voice.

Lutwill wore a [[hauberk]] and a [[steel]] [[Helmet|cap]] over [[Deer|buckskin]] pants, with [[boots]] made of scaled [[leather]] that might have been from a [[dragonet]]. He wore a thick [[bear]]skin vest over his armor that left his thick, muscular arms bare.
document_data.Personality: As revealed by the [[magic item|magic]] [[saber]] ''[[Crackletongue]]'', Lutwill was an evil baron. He enjoyed the company of women.
document_data.Possessions: Baron Lutwill owned the [[Castle Lutwill|castle named after him]]. He fought with a [[greataxe]].
document_data.Relationships: The chamberlain for Baron Lutwill was named [[Whimberton]].
document_data.History:
Baron Lutwill claimed to have received his power from the city council of [[Zazesspur]]. In the summer of the {{YearlinkName|1366}}, he sought to double the taxes on the villages in his lands with only seven days notice. On the night that he sent out his soldiers to collect the taxes, [[Star Protective Services]]—led by [[Zaranda Star]]—and a group of villagers from the region around Castle Lutwill stormed the castle.

When Zaranda reached the penthouse and began to battle Baron Lutwill, they were equally matched until Lutwill's chamberlain, Whimberton, [[Hold person|held]] her with his magic. Lutwill considered whether to kill her immediately or to have his way with her. However, Zaranda's charge and apprentice, [[Chenowyn]], arrived, and surrounded Whimberton with [[summon swarm|magical shimmering lights]], which caused the [[wizard]] to fall through a window to his death. Zaranda was then free to move again. She kneed Lutwill in the groin, dodged his final swing, covered his head with a [[wolf]]skin, and then stabbed him in the face repeatedly.
